title: Executive Assistant
description:
Attention, Rockstars! We‚Äôre looking for a full-time Executive Assistant. This role provides high-level administrative support to the CEO, ensuring the smooth operation of daily activities. This role involves managing schedules, coordinating meetings, handling communications, and performing a wide range of administrative tasks to support executives in their strategic responsibilities. The Executive Assistant acts as a key point of contact and is responsible for maintaining confidentiality, ensuring efficient workflow, and managing critical tasks with professionalism and discretion.



Responsibilities:

Manage the executive‚Äôs calendar, scheduling meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements, and ensuring that time is allocated efficiently.

Act as the primary point of contact for internal and external communications, screening calls,
s, and visitors, and directing inquiries as appropriate.

Coordinate meetings, conferences, and events, including preparing agendas, arranging logistics, and ensuring all materials are available.

Prepare and edit correspondence, reports, presentations, and other documents on behalf of the executive.

Handle confidential information with the utmost discretion and ensure sensitive documents are securely maintained.

Assist with special projects, conducting research, gathering data, and preparing reports as required by the executive.

Liaise with other departments and executives to ensure smooth communication and collaboration on cross-functional initiatives.

Anticipate the executive's needs and provide support to ensure they are well-prepared for meetings, presentations, and other engagements.



Qualifications/Requirements:

Proven experience (1-2 years) as an Executive Assistant, Personal Assistant, or in a similar role supporting senior executives.

Exceptional organizational skills with the ability to prioritize tasks, manage multiple responsibilities, and meet deadlines.

Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a professional and polished demeanor.

Strong attention to detail and accuracy in completing tasks.

High level of discretion and confidentiality when handling sensitive information.

Proficiency in GSuite (Doc, Sheet, Slides, Drive) and Zoom Workspace and familiarity with office management tools and software.

Ability to work independently and proactively, with a strong sense of initiative.

Strong interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with executives, staff, and external contacts.



Our Purpose:

To develop and market products that help individuals to grow in multiple facets in life.

To Increase awareness and skill sets for the public we serve.

To make a significant difference in the quality of life of people not reaching their potential and those often left behind.

To produce and develop Millionaire closers.



By applying, you will show that you are committed to being a SUCCESS, and your success is important to us. I believe in supporting our clients and helping associates achieve their financial goals.



The position is Full-Time (remote) between the hours of 8:00AM - 5:00PM Pacific Standard Time, Monday through Friday.



About Mike Barron & Limelight Media LLC:

My name is Mike Barron and I am the founder of Limelight Media, a leading online coaching and sales training academy. Many of our students are seeking career change and or looking to acquire high-ticket skill sets so as to achieve career advancement and financial freedom. We are leaders in the online coaching industry and have receipts of multiple ‚ÄúTwo Comma Club‚Äù Awards.



I'm really active on social media (Check out my IG and 
 and "influence" is a cornerstone of our operation. We create daily content, record coaching calls, case studies, short films, etc... The culture is fast-paced, raw, and fun... I was a former school President in my last job in 2013, and let's just say I'm Far (far) removed from that corporate-type environment. You can learn more about our community here: 
.





A CULTURE LIKE NO OTHER!

Limelight Media has a culture like no other! Our mission is to spread positivity and create an uplifting environment for all of our employees. We offer a Disneyland-like experience for everyone we engage with - employees, students, business partners and anyone else we come into contact with. At our facility you will find a fun atmosphere that consists of energetic employees, arcade games, basketball hoops, food and drinks, 85 inch TVs and more! Come be a part of something great!!!



Limelight Media offers many packages that teach personal awareness, sales techniques, skills to become a master closer, and how to become the best version of yourself!



Limelight Media LLC is an equal opportunity employer. All aspects of employment including the decision to hire, promote, discipline, or discharge, will be based on merit, competence, performance, and business needs. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, marital status, age, national origin, ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, pregnancy, genetic information, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, veteran status, or any other status protected under federal, state, or local law.

‚Ä¢
 ad campaigns exceed 
 targets = $50-100 bonus

/month + bonuses

/month + bonuses

mbers

‚Ä¢ Earnings: $600-1,200+/month + bonuses



-------------------------



To Apply:

Please include ALL of the following (incomplete applications will not be considered):

1. GoHighLevel Portfolio:

‚Ä¢ Share 2-3 examples of GHL accounts you've built (screenshots or Loom video walkthrough)

‚Ä¢ Describe the most complex automation you've built in GHL

2.
 Ads Case Study:

3. Technical Test (Quick):

 24 hours after a job is marked "Complete" in GHL. Walk me through how you'd set this up.

 ad campaign has a CPL of $85 when your target is $30. What are the first 3 things you'd check/adjust?

5. Why You're a Great Fit:

-------------------------



Interview Process:

‚Ä¢ Step 2: Video Interview (30 minutes): Top candidates will be invited for a Zoom interview to discuss your experience and approach.

‚Ä¢ Step 3: Paid Test Project ($50-100): Only 2-3 finalists will be invited to complete a paid test project:

 lead gen campaign (we provide budget)

Step 4: Hire Decision

We'll select the best candidate and begin onboarding.



------------------



Start Date: We're looking to hire within the next 2-3 weeks. Ideal candidate can start by early March 2026.

title: Cold Caller / Appointment Setter (SDR) ‚Äì Commercial Cleaning
description:
You must have experienced in appointment setter/ cold calling and experience in go high level. 

We are commercial cleaning company is looking for a Cold Caller / Appointment Setter (SDR) to call lead lists into qualified walkthrough appointments for the sales team.



This is a long-term role for someone who is confident on the phone, organized in a CRM, and hungry to earn more based on performance.



Responsibilities



Daily Calling & Outreach

 ‚Ä¢ Make outbound calls to businesses from provided lead lists and CRM

 ‚Ä¢ Follow a clear script to:

 ‚Ä¢ Introduce the company and services

 ‚Ä¢ Ask qualifying questions (type of facility, size, cleaning frequency, current provider, contract timing)

 ‚Ä¢ Identify pain points with their current cleaning solution

 ‚Ä¢ Book walkthrough appointments for the sales/operations team

 ‚Ä¢ Send follow-up
s and SMS through the CRM to confirm and remind appointments

 ‚Ä¢ Handle light objections and keep conversations professional, friendly, and confident



CRM & Pipeline Management

 ‚Ä¢ Work from the CRM (e.g., GoHighLevel or similar) ‚Äì no loose spreadsheets

 ‚Ä¢ Update lead status after every call (New, Contacted, Qualified, Walkthrough Set, Not Interested, etc.)

 ‚Ä¢ Add clear notes so the sales team knows what was discussed

 ‚Ä¢ Tag and mark leads that are not a fit (too small, residential only, wrong contact, etc.)

 ‚Ä¢ Schedule follow-ups for ‚Äúcall back later,‚Äù ‚Äúrenewing soon,‚Äù and other warm opportunities



Reporting & Communication

 ‚Ä¢ Attend short weekly check-ins via Zoom with the team

 ‚Ä¢ Send simple daily reports:

 ‚Ä¢ Number of calls made

 ‚Ä¢ Number of conversations

 ‚Ä¢ Number of qualified appointments booked and confirmed

 ‚Ä¢ Feedback on common objections or patterns you‚Äôre hearing

 ‚Ä¢ Suggest script or process improvements based on real conversations





Ideal Candidate

 ‚Ä¢ Strong spoken English ‚Äì clear, confident, and easy to understand

 ‚Ä¢ Previous experience in:

 ‚Ä¢ B2B cold calling, and/or

 ‚Ä¢ Appointment setting, and/or

 ‚Ä¢ SDR/inside sales for service-based businesses (cleaning, home services, marketing, real estate, etc.)

 ‚Ä¢ Comfortable making 60‚Äì80 outbound calls per day

 ‚Ä¢ Able to follow a script AND adjust naturally in conversation

 ‚Ä¢ Familiar with any CRM (GoHighLevel, HubSpot, Salesforce, etc.) ‚Äì willing to learn a new one if needed

 ‚Ä¢ Organized and disciplined: updates notes and statuses in real time

 ‚Ä¢ Thick-skinned and positive: not afraid of ‚Äúno‚Äù and keeps going





What Success Looks Like



You are successful in this role if you consistently:

 ‚Ä¢ Hit 60‚Äì80 dials per day

 ‚Ä¢ Book 12‚Äì20 qualified walkthrough appointments per month

 ‚Ä¢ Keep no-show rates low by confirming and reminding prospects

 ‚Ä¢ Maintain clean, accurate records in the CRM so the team always knows:

 ‚Ä¢ Who has been contacted

 ‚Ä¢ Who is interested

 ‚Ä¢ Who is not a fit and why





Schedule

 ‚Ä¢ 40 hours per week (can start part-time and increase if it‚Äôs a good fit)

 ‚Ä¢ Must be able to work during U.S. business hours (Eastern Time overlap) for calling windows





Compensation



This role is paid with a mix of base + performance:

 ‚Ä¢ Base Pay: $640/month

 ‚Ä¢ Bonus: $20 for each qualified appointment that actually holds (not just booked)

 ‚Ä¢ Commission: 5% of the first month‚Äôs contract value on any contract over $2,500/month that comes from your appointments



If you perform well, your earnings can grow quickly month over month.





How to Apply



Please include:

 1. A short note about your cold calling or appointment setting experience

 2. A brief audio or Loom/video sample (1‚Äì2 minutes) of you introducing yourself as if you were calling a facility manager about commercial cleaning services

 3. Your availability (hours per week and time zone)

EST time zone required

title: Social Media & YouTube Marketing Manager (Real Estate)
description:
We‚Äôre looking for a strategic Social Media & YouTube Marketing Manager, not just a content poster.



This is a long-term, full-time role for someone who understands brand building, YouTube growth, video strategy, ads, and AI-powered marketing‚Äîsomeone who can think ahead, analyze data, and help grow a recognizable real estate brand with minimal supervision.



This role is not task-based. You will own the marketing direction, especially for YouTube and social platforms.



CORE FOCUS AREAS (VERY IMPORTANT)

- Brand Building ‚Äì 60%

- Video Editing & Content Execution ‚Äì 30%

- Other - 10%



PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES



1. YouTube

YouTube is our #1 growth channel.

You will be responsible for end-to-end YouTube management, including:



Long-form YouTube Content:

- Create high-converting thumbnails

- Write SEO-optimized titles, descriptions, and tags

- Use VidIQ for keyword research, optimization, and competitive analysis

- Upload, schedule, and publish videos

- Track performance, analytics, CTR, watch time, retention, and growth

- Continuously improve content based on data



YouTube Shorts:

- Repurpose long-form content into Shorts

- Edit, format, caption, and schedule Shorts

- Optimize hooks, pacing, and visuals for engagement



YouTube Ad

- Manage YouTube ad campaigns

- Support creative testing, hooks, thumbnails, and targeting

- Monitor performance and suggest improvements



2. Instagram &

You‚Äôll manage and grow our presence across Meta platforms with a marketing-first mindset, not just posting.

- Create and edit Reels (intermediate level required)

- Design and schedule posts, carousels, and stories

- Write captions with strong hooks and CTAs

- Applicants must use Real Estate SMM

- Boost posts and manage sponsored content

- Handle Meta Ads at an intermediate level:

¬∑ Campaign setup

¬∑ Scheduling

¬∑ Basic optimization and monitoring

- Ensure consistency in branding, tone, and visuals



3. Google Presence & Analytics

- Manage Google My Business:

¬∑ Posts

¬∑ Updates

¬∑ Reviews

¬∑ Products/services

- Monitor Google Analytics and performance data

- Track how content and traffic support brand visibility and lead generation



4. Marketing Manager Responsibilities

You are not just executing ‚Äî you are thinking like a manager.

- Plan content calendars aligned with business goals

- Propose campaigns and growth ideas

- Analyze what‚Äôs working and what‚Äôs not

- Report insights clearly and simply

- Coordinate with leadership on strategy and priorities



5. AI & Innovation

We expect you to use AI intelligently, not blindly.

- Use tools like ChatGPT, Canva AI, AI video tools, etc.

- Speed up workflows while maintaining quality

- Suggest better systems, tools, and processes

- Stay updated on trends in AI, marketing, and content creation



BASIC REQUIREMENTS

- Minimum 2 years of experience in Social Media Marketing or Digital Marketing

- Real estate experience is a strong advantage

- Proven experience managing YouTube channels

- Strong understanding of branding and content strategy

- Intermediate video editing skills (Reels, Shorts)

- Intermediate experience with Meta Ads

- Comfortable working independently with minimal supervision

- Strong communication, organization, and time management skills



WHO THIS ROLE IS FOR

- Someone who thinks strategically

- Someone who understands YouTube as a growth engine

- Someone who cares about branding, consistency, and results

- Someone who takes ownership and doesn‚Äôt wait for instructions



- This role is not for beginners

- This role is not for task-only executors



COMPANY OVERVIEW

We are a BC, Canada‚Äìbased real estate team focused on modern marketing, strong branding, and long-term growth. We value ownership, creativity, and people who think ahead.



HOW TO APPLY

To apply, please:

Send your resume / CV

Include portfolio links:

YouTube channels managed

Don't use "Rockstar VA" in your application. Read carefully again to find the correct term to use.

Thumbnails you‚Äôve created

Reels / Shorts

Ads or campaigns you‚Äôve worked on



We‚Äôre not looking for ‚Äújust an SMM.‚Äù

We‚Äôre looking for someone who can build a brand and grow an audience.



- IMPORTANT: SKILLS TEST / TRIAL TASK -

We‚Äôve hired many SMMs before, and not everyone performs at the level they claim.

Because of this, we will hire based on performance, not interviews.

Shortlisted applicants will complete a practical test.

The fastest and highest-quality submission will be hired.

title: Photo Editor / Photo Culler / Photo Retoucher
description:
Hello there! 



Hope you're having a great day so far! I'm looking for a photo editor / retoucher / photo culler that has worked in the wedding industry before. Someone that has also done retouching for portraits to remove blemishes, dodge and burn, etc. You must be proficient in Lightroom and Photoshop to apply for this role. I'm looking for someone that is willing to work with us long-term, for many years to come. We are a wedding photographer duo that is in the mid tier and hoping to strive towards getting our photography work better and better. 



I'm in need of someone that can work efficiently on their own and deliver albums on time. You'll be responsible for culling wedding albums that range anywhere from
photos per album to around
. Also smaller couple and family photoshoots that will be smaller in size. We also create GIFS which I can show you how to do in photoshop. Someone that is VERY detail oriented is required (example: editing away a bra strap that is sticking out or hiding the wrinkles on a dress). Must be great at communicating in english. Willing to put in the time and work to perfect images is key. Also, someone that learns once or twice, and doesn't keep making the same mistakes over and over again.



I'm looking for someone to do a price per photo rate as that's what my previous photo editor. Our current photo editor unfortunately has to leave due to personal reasons so can no longer help us even though she was amazing. Our payment terms that we've agreed upon is 5php per photo for cull and editing so i'm hoping to keep the same rate.



I'm fairly easy going and understand that the beginning is always a learning process. So I want someone that is willing to listen and watch how I do things and potentially make it even better!



If interested, please send a link with your previous LRCAT so I can see how you edit and colour correct. 



Thank you so much for applying! 

Joseph
salary: 5php per photo for cull and editing

title: Customer Service Representative
description:

Role Summary

, and social media leads within 15 minutes

title: CapCut Video / Reel Editing & Content Culling Support
description:
*PLEASE DO NOT APPLY IF YOU DO NOT HAVE EXPERIENCE WORKING WITH BEAUTY BRANDS / TREATMENTS*



Requirements of Application:

- Must be able to provide examples of beauty industry work, if work is unable to be provided, minimum of 2 years experience is essential.

- This role is for part time hours, and may increase to a full time opportunity for the right candidate.

- More than 1 role available depending on your editing strengths.

- Please provide a portfolio of your video editing skills, those with interview style & beauty / event experienced editors will be highly favoured.



Important Note:

I will require a contract to be signed that includes a non-disclosure clause:

You agree not to share or use any of the content in your portfolio or elsewhere.



If the below skills sound like strengths of yours I would love to hear from you!



------------------------



I am looking for ongoing support with editing tasks, and would like to secure weekly hours with the right candidate



You will be able to demonstrate:

- Strong attention to detail

- Story telling abilities

- Ability to identify the best parts of raw content/videos (whether that be in terms of strong emotion, or highest quality of details), with regards to culling support.

- Ability to conceptualise / come up with ideas without need for instruction



The tasks I am looking for support on include:



1. Face to Camera Content Edits (on CapCut)

These are short talking videos where I or clients speak to the camera.



I would need you to:



- Edit the transcript

- Cut out pauses, filler words (like "um", "ahh")

- Add transitions and sound effects when needed

- Add overlays - where it makes sense to reflect an overlay, not placed at random (I will film and provide these)

Overlay skill is key for identifying and noticing vocal ques, while also not transitioning them off the screen too fast where the viewer is unable to process what the overlay truly showed ie. if it is a beauty before and after the viewer must be able to process the work, not be overstimulated.





Examples of my past editing / clients:

/p/DH5RBCJh1gF/



-Story telling abilities, identifying opportunity out of raw content:


/p/DQ3hwjZEeIs/



-Story telling abilities


/p/DUFmgK6D6Dt/


/p/DOstvymkcdM/





--------------



Beauty Service Content (Culling Only Support, for me to self edit OR, completed Edits of this style if capabilities align)

This is content I film of my clients getting treatments like brow lamination, lash lift, or cosmetic tattooing.



Culling support looks like:



- Scan through all the footage, cutting each clip down to approx 0.8 seconds.

Cut out and save the best clips - focus on close-ups, clean shots, good angles & lighting, + a variation of distance + close up clips.



- Don‚Äôt reorder anything - just delete the unnecessary parts



- Upload the culled version back to CapCut Space - I will complete the final editing

- For the right candidate I am looking for support to complete the entire edit in time / with training where necessary*



Examples of my past editing / clients:



- 

-

--------------



Event Content (Same structure as the above applies).

I film birthdays, weddings, and beauty training sessions. The raw videos once imported to CapCut can start between 30 - 200 minutes worth of raw footage to cut down.



For these, I would need you to:



- Scan through all the footage, cutting each clip down to approx 0.8-1.5 seconds.



- Identify and keep the best and most emotional clips (smiles, laughs, tears, reactions, etc.), plus the best footage of the overall event (the decor, and everything) - Delete any extra content (that is less favourable, bad lighting etc.)



- No reordering needed - I will finish the edit

HOWEVER, am ideally looking for a strong video editor to complete these edits in full.

title: Time Doctor Admin
description:
About the Role



We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Time Doctor Administrator to manage and monitor our team‚Äôs time-tracking activities. The ideal candidate must have hands-on experience using Time Doctor and a strong ability to analyze data, identify discrepancies, and support HR, Finance, and Operations in maintaining accurate and compliant records.



You will ensure that productivity data is reliable, reports are accurate, and company time-tracking policies are followed.



Application Criteria



We‚Äôre looking for candidates who have:



Proven experience managing Time Doctor (required) or similar time-tracking tools.

Experience in administrative, reporting, or time-management roles.

Strong attention to detail and excellent organizational skills.

Proficiency in Google Workspace (Sheets, Docs, etc.) for data validation and analysis.

Ability to handle confidential data with discretion.

Good communication skills and the ability to collaborate with multiple teams.



Key Responsibilities



Time Doctor Management & Reporting



Generate, review, and validate daily, weekly, and monthly Time Doctor reports.

Ensure accurate logged hours, activity levels, and task tracking data.

Identify and escalate discrepancies, irregularities, and missing/incorrect entries.



Compliance & Monitoring

Flag unapproved manual entries, idle time, or unusual activity.

Data Analysis & Productivity Insights

Track trends in time usage, activity rates, and project allocations.

Support process improvement and resource optimization initiatives.



Coordination & Support



Serve as the primary contact for Time Doctor issues and report inquiries.

Coordinate with HR, Finance, and Operations to support accurate payroll and invoicing.

Clearly communicate findings and recommend actions when needed.



Benefits:

13th Month Payroll

Paid Social Security System

Paid training

Performance Goals with advancement compensation

Work from home

title: HubSpot CRM Manager (Sales & Marketing Operations)
description:
We‚Äôre looking for a hands-on HubSpot CRM Manager to fix, rebuild, and own our HubSpot CRM across Sales and Marketing.

The system exists today but isn‚Äôt usable. Your first priority will be to design a clean, scalable CRM foundation. From there, the role evolves into ongoing optimization, support, and continuous improvement as the business grows.



This is not a data entry role. You‚Äôll be responsible for architecture, workflows, integrations, and CRM usability.



In This Role, You Will



‚Ä¢ Design and implement the core HubSpot CRM structure across Sales and Marketing, including pipelines, lifecycle stages, lead statuses, properties, views, and standardized records

‚Ä¢ Establish a scalable CRM foundation, including naming conventions, required fields, permissions, data hygiene rules, and internal SOPs

‚Ä¢ Build and maintain HubSpot workflows and automations, such as lead routing, lifecycle updates, task creation, internal alerts, and nurturing sequences

‚Ä¢ Set up and manage HubSpot integrations (native or via middleware), ensuring clean data flow and resolving sync or attribution issues

‚Ä¢ Diagnose why the current HubSpot setup is not being used effectively and fix configuration gaps that impact usability, reporting, or adoption

‚Ä¢ Transition from implementation into ongoing CRM ownership, providing user support, refining workflows, maintaining integrations, and evolving the system as needs change



You‚Äôll Succeed in This Role If You



‚Ä¢ Have hands-on experience building or rebuilding HubSpot Sales and Marketing hubs from the ground up

‚Ä¢ Think in systems and processes, not just tools, and can translate messy workflows into clean CRM logic

‚Ä¢ Are proactive and detail-oriented, especially around data hygiene, accuracy, and reporting integrity

‚Ä¢ Are comfortable owning both initial implementation and long-term optimization/support

‚Ä¢ Can clearly explain CRM decisions to non-technical stakeholders and help drive adoption

‚Ä¢ Adapt quickly as requirements evolve, adjusting automations, properties, and reporting accordingly

title: Personal & Small Business Financial Manager
description:
Overview:

We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Financial Manager to oversee personal household finances and the financial operations of two small businesses. This role is responsible for delivering complete cash flow visibility across all entities while ensuring accurate tracking, reporting, and financial oversight.



Key Responsibilities:

‚Ä¢ Oversee and manage personal household finances, including budgeting, expense tracking, and financial planning.

‚Ä¢ Manage day-to-day financial operations for Business #1 and Business #2, ensuring accuracy and organization across all accounts.

‚Ä¢ Provide consolidated cash flow visibility across all entities to support informed financial decision-making.

‚Ä¢ Handle bill management, ensuring all invoices and obligations are paid accurately and on time.

‚Ä¢ Track and manage vendor relationships, including payment schedules, contract oversight, and documentation.

‚Ä¢ Monitor and track all income sources across household and business entities.

‚Ä¢ Oversee debt management and payoff strategies, including tracking balances, interest rates, and repayment schedules.

‚Ä¢ Prepare and maintain clean, organized financial records to ensure smooth and accurate year-end reporting in collaboration with accountants or tax professionals.

‚Ä¢ Identify opportunities to improve financial systems, streamline processes, and enhance reporting accuracy.



Qualifications:

‚Ä¢ Proven experience managing personal and small business finances.

‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of bookkeeping principles and financial reporting.

‚Ä¢ Experience with accounting software such as QuickBooks, Xero, or similar platforms.

‚Ä¢ Exceptional organizational skills with high attention to detail.

‚Ä¢ Ability to manage multiple entities simultaneously while maintaining clarity and accuracy.

‚Ä¢ Strong analytical skills and ability to interpret financial data.

‚Ä¢ High level of discretion and professionalism when handling sensitive financial information.



HOW TO APPLY:

‚Ä¢ Please include a link to your resume (not portfolio) along with your preferred wage per hour in USD.



Preferred Qualifications:

‚Ä¢ Experience supporting multiple small businesses simultaneously.

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with year-end tax preparation processes.

‚Ä¢ Background in financial planning or accounting.

‚Ä¢ CPA or equivalent educational background.



Success in This Role Looks Like:

‚Ä¢ Complete financial clarity across personal and business accounts.

‚Ä¢ Timely bill payments and accurate vendor management.

‚Ä¢ Up-to-date income and expense tracking.

‚Ä¢ Strategic oversight of debt reduction.

‚Ä¢ Well-organized records that allow for seamless year-end reporting.

title: Supply Chain & Inventory Manager
description:
About the Role



We‚Äôre hiring a supply chain / inventory operator whose #1 mission is simple: we never run out of stock. You‚Äôll own inventory planning end-to-end for a fast-moving e-commerce jewelry brand: from forecasting and purchase planning to inbound tracking, warehouse coordination, and reorder systems.

This role is for someone who is obsessive about numbers, timelines, and execution. If you‚Äôve managed SKUs before and can build a clean replenishment system that prevents stockouts without overbuying, you‚Äôll thrive here.



Core Mission



Maintain healthy stock levels across all best-sellers and variants

Build a system that prevents stockouts, reduces overstock, and keeps cashflow efficient

Provide visibility: we should always know what we have, what‚Äôs coming, when it lands, and what to reorder next

Responsibilities



Inventory Planning & Replenishment



Build and maintain a reorder system (reorder points + safety stock + lead times per SKU/variant)

Create weekly replenishment plans and make sure POs are issued on time

Track days of cover (DOC) per SKU and prevent ‚Äúsurprise‚Äù stockouts

Manage new launches: ensure inventory is ready before marketing pushes

Forecasting & Reporting

Forecast demand using Shopify + historical sales + promo/calendar inputs

Produce weekly reporting:

Top sellers + velocity by variant

Low stock + risk list (what will stock out and when)

Inbound list (what‚Äôs ordered, what‚Äôs in production, what‚Äôs shipping, what‚Äôs arrived)

Purchase plan (what to reorder, quantities, and target dates)

Build simple dashboards (Google Sheets/Excel) for clarity and accountability



Purchase Orders & Supplier Coordination



Create and manage POs, confirm production schedules, and follow up aggressively

Track lead times, production updates, and QC checkpoints

Coordinate shipping (air/sea) and ensure documents are correct

Keep vendor performance scorecards (on-time rate, quality issues, communication speed)



Warehouse / 3PL Coordination



Coordinate inbound receiving with the 3PL/warehouse

Ensure accurate receiving, correct SKU labeling, and clean inventory counts

Investigate and resolve discrepancies (missing units, incorrect counts, damage)



Requirements (Must-Have)



Experience managing multiple SKUs/variants and replenishment planning

Strong ownership mentality: you chase updates and close loops fast

Excellent communication and organization (you keep everyone aligned)



Nice-to-Have (Bonus)



Experience with jewelry, fashion accessories, or high-SKU variant products

Experience working with China-based suppliers and international freight

Familiarity with 3PL operations, receiving procedures, cycle counts



What Success Looks Like (KPIs)



Stockout rate near zero on top SKUs

High in-stock % on best sellers (especially core variants)

Accurate inventory counts and clean reconciliation

On-time PO placement and stable lead time tracking

Clear weekly reporting that leadership can act on immediately

title: AI Social Media Manager (High Volume)
description:
Location: Remote

Type: Contract / Full-time Retainer

Compensation: $1,500 AUD per month

About The Brand



We are a 7-figure Australian brand focused on growth. We don't believe in posting once a day and hoping for the best. We believe in dominating the feed. We are looking for a relentless content creator who can use AI to build a massive, aesthetically pleasing digital footprint that drives actual revenue.

The Mission



Your goal is simple: Volume + Aesthetics = Sales.

You will use AI to turn one idea into 10 assets. You will manage our Instagram and TikTok, ensuring we are posting 10 times a day without sacrificing quality or brand look and feel.

Key Responsibilities

The "10 Daily Posts" Strategy: You will generate and schedule 10 pieces of content daily across IG Reels, TikTok, and Feed Posts. You must use AI to speed this up (e.g., repurposing one concept into a Reel, a Carousel, and a static quote).

Daily Story Selling: Post 5+ stories a day. These aren't just random photos‚Äîthey must include links, engagement stickers, and clear CTAs to drive traffic to our shop.

AI Content Production:

Reels: Use AI video tools (Veo, CapCut, etc.) to create engaging hooks and b-roll.

Carousels & Statics: Use Nano Banana Pro to generate high-quality, aesthetic images, infographics, and on-brand backgrounds instantly.

Aesthetic Curation: Ensure the grid looks cohesive. Even with high volume, the brand must look premium.

Community Management: Briefly engage with comments on the posts you put up to boost algorithm favorability.

Requirements

AI Native: You don't just "know" AI; you use it to clone yourself. You are proficient with Nano Banana Pro for images and tools like CapCut/Veo for video.

High-Speed Editor: You can edit a Reel in minutes, not hours. You understand pacing, trending audio, and hooks.

Revenue Focused: You understand that "Likes" are vanity and "Sales" are sanity. You know how to write captions that get people to click the link in bio.

Visual Eye: You can spot a "bad" font or "off" color instantly. You know how to maintain a consistent brand vibe.

Organized: Managing 300+ posts a month requires extreme organization. You must be comfortable using scheduling tools (e.g., Later, Buffer, or similar).

The Offer

Consistent Income: $1,500 AUD/month retainer.

Creative Freedom: We give you the keys to the brand's voice; you experiment and find what goes viral.

Access to Tools: We will provide access to our enterprise AI tools.

How to Apply

Send us a link to a social media account you have managed.

Screening Question: Please list the exact AI stack (tools) you would use to generate 10 posts in one day for a brand like ours.



Recommendation for your interview process:

Since 10 posts/day is a lot, ask applicants to do a paid test task: "Here is one product image. Use AI to create 3 distinct pieces of content (1 Story, 1 Post, 1 Reel concept) in under 30 minutes." This will immediately show you if they are actually fast enough to handle your volume.

title: Affiliate & UGC Manager
description:
About the Role



We‚Äôre hiring an Affiliate / UGC Manager to help us find great creators, reach out, manage collabs, and keep a steady flow of content coming in for our jewelry brand. This role is all about speed, organization, and taste finding creators who truly match our brand and making sure everything gets delivered cleanly and on time.



What You‚Äôll Do



Source creators daily on TikTok + Instagram (UGC creators and influencers)

Use a strong eye for detail to pick creators who match our brand identity (look, vibe, tone, aesthetics, audience)

Send outreach DMs/emails and follow up consistently

Negotiate simple deals (deliverables, timeline, price, usage rights)

Send creators clear briefs (what to say, what to show, how to film)

Track everything in a simple system (Notion/Google Sheets): who we contacted, who accepted, shipping, deadlines, delivery status

title: Google & YouTube Ads Specialist For Ecommerce Brand (AI-Enabled)
description:
Job Title: Google & YouTube Ads Specialist (AI-Enabled)

Location: Remote

Type: Contract / Retainer

Compensation: $1,500 AUD per month

About The Brand

We are a 7-figure Australian e-commerce brand. We have the traffic and the products; now we need a sniper to scale our paid search and video acquisition. We are looking for a media buyer who combines deep technical knowledge of the Google ecosystem with the creative speed of AI.

The Objective

Your goal is to drive profitable growth (ROAS). You will manage our Google Search, Shopping (PMax), and heavily scale our YouTube Ads presence using AI-generated and edited creatives.

Key Responsibilities

Google Ads Management: End-to-end management of Search, Shopping, and Performance Max campaigns. You monitor bids, budgets, and negative keywords daily.

YouTube Ad Scaling: Launch and optimize YouTube In-Stream and Shorts ads.

AI Creative Strategy:

Use AI tools (like Veo or similar) to rapidly iterate on video hooks, voiceovers, and visual assets for YouTube ads.

Write high-converting ad scripts using AI to test different angles (educational, user-generated style, direct response).

Data & Attribution: Ensure conversion tracking is pixel-perfect. You don't guess; you make decisions based on data.

Reporting: Weekly reports on ROAS, CPA, and Spend vs. Target.

Requirements

Proven Media Buying Experience: You have managed ad spend for e-commerce brands and can show screenshots of results (ROAS improvement, scaling spend).

YouTube Creative Expert: You understand that the "creative is the targeting." You know how to structure a winning YouTube ad (Hook -> Retain -> CTA).

AI Proficient: You use AI tools to speed up copywriting, scriptwriting, and video editing. You are not afraid to use new tech to get an edge.

Google Analytics/GA4 Master: You know how to read the data to find where we are leaking money.

The Offer

Monthly Retainer: $1,500 AUD/month.

Growth Potential: Opportunity to handle higher budgets as ROAS targets are met.

Flexible Work: Focus on results, not hours.

How to Apply

Please submit a brief case study or summary of a brand you helped scale using Google or YouTube Ads.

Question: What is your favorite AI tool for generating or editing video ad creatives right now?

title: Financial Controller (Remote ‚Äî Melbourne Hours)

lbourne time (AEST/AEDT), Monday‚ÄìFriday 



ATOM Modular Group is a fast-growing Australian manufacturing business creating functional spaces for hard-working people. First 4 weeks (what success looks like)

-  Week 2: Execute finance catch-up; review next month‚Äôs Balance Sheet & P&L with analytics. 

-  Week 3: Complete/verify month completion; continue SOP documentation. 

-  Week 4: Implement KPI dashboard, reporting & tax compliance calendar, weekly performance monitoring + issue log. 



Must-have experience 

-  Proven Financial Controller / Senior Accountant experience (remote experience preferred) 

-  Construction and/or manufacturing background with strong job/project costing capability (budget vs actual, WIP, margin tracking) 

-  Strong knowledge of Australian compliance (month-end close, BAS/GST, PAYG/IAS, payroll processes) 

-  Experience with multi-entity reporting/consolidation 

-  Able to work 9:00am‚Äì5:00p
lbourne time (AEST/AEDT), Monday‚ÄìFriday 

-  Excellent English communication and ability to explain numbers to non-finance leaders 



Nice to have 

-  CPA/CA qualification (or equivalent) 

-  Experience with progress claims, retentions, variations, and project-based revenue recognition 

-  Dashboard/KPI reporting experience (Power BI / Excel models) 



How to Apply 



If you‚Äôre interested in this role, please
 your application (including your resume and OLJ profile) to 
 with the subject line: ‚ÄúFinancial Controller ‚Äì Full Name.‚Äù

title: Paid Social Media Buyer (Meta & TikTok) ‚Äì High Volume
description:
Location: Remote

Type: Contract / Retainer

Compensation: $1,500 AUD per month

The Opportunity

We are a 7-figure Australian brand aggressively scaling our customer acquisition. We have the creative pipeline; now we need a technical operator to deploy it. We aren't looking for a generalist‚Äîwe need a sniper who understands manual bidding and high-velocity creative testing.

The Mission

Launch 100+ Ads Per Week.

Your primary objective is to execute a rigorous creative testing strategy. You will take our creative assets and launch them at volume to find winners, cut losers, and scale profit.

Key Responsibilities

High-Volume Execution: Set up and launch 100+ new ads per week across
 (Meta) and TikTok. You must be fast, organized, and precise in Ads Manager.

Advanced Bidding Strategies: You don't just rely on auto-bidding. You are an expert in Cost Caps, Bid Caps, and Cost Controls to protect our downside while scaling spend.

Creative Testing: Implement a systematic testing framework (e.g., 3:2:2 or dynamic creative testing) to identify winning hooks and angles quickly.

Optimization: Monitor campaigns daily. Kill underperforming ads ruthlessly and scale winners using manual bids to maintain target CPA.

Reporting: distinct reporting on "Creative Performance" vs. "Campaign Performance." We need to know which creative is driving the revenue.

Requirements

Technical Media Buying: You understand the mechanics of the Meta & TikTok algorithms. You know exactly when to use an Advantage+ campaign vs. a manual CBO with Cost Caps.

High-Volume Experience: You are not intimidated by managing hundreds of active ads. You have strict naming conventions and organizational skills to keep the ad account clean.

Data-Driven: You make decisions based on ROAS, CPA, and Hook Rate/Hold Rate data.

TikTok Native: You understand the nuances of TikTok Ads (Spark Ads, Pangle, etc.) and how they differ from
.

The Offer

Pay: $1,500 AUD/month retainer.

Budget: You will be managing a healthy monthly ad spend with room to scale as results improve.

Access: We provide the creative assets; you focus on the buying and the strategy.

How to Apply

Please submit a screenshot of a campaign where you successfully utilized Cost Caps or Bid Caps (blur out client names).

Screening Question: "If you have 5 winning creatives and 3 winning audiences, exactly how would you structure the campaign to scale them while maintaining a $25 CPA?"

title: Senior Video Editor for Ads, VSLs & Personal Brand (Full?Time, Long?Term)
description:
We run multiple brands in home services and online education and spend aggressively on paid ads. We produce VSLs, direct?response ads, and personal brand content (shorts & long?form). We are looking for a world?class Video Editor to own all post?production.



Role Overview



You will be responsible for turning raw talking?head and b?roll footage into:

High?converting paid ads (Meta, TikTok, YouTube)

VSLs / sales videos

Short?form content for personal brand (Reels, Shorts, TikTok)

Occasional long?form videos and podcasts

This is a full?time, long?term role. We want someone who treats this like their main career, not a side gig.



Responsibilities



Edit performance?focused ads: fast cuts, clear hooks, captions, pattern interrupts, etc.

Edit and assemble VSLs (structure, pacing, graphics, proof overlays).

Turn long videos into multiple short clips with strong hooks.

Add captions, motion graphics, simple animations, SFX, and music that match brand.

Create multiple variants of winning ads (hooks, angles, lengths). 

Organize footage, projects, and exports in a clean, repeatable system.

Work closely with founder/marketing to implement feedback quickly.



Requirements



3+ years editing for direct?response / online brands (not just cinematic wedding reels).

Strong portfolio of ads and short?form content (send links).

Expert in Adobe Premiere Pro (After Effects is a big plus).

Understands hooks, watch time, and thumb?stopping first 3 seconds. 

Comfortable working in US time overlap (at least 3‚Äì4 hours).

Speaks and writes clear English.

Stable internet, good computer, and fast turnaround times.



Nice to Have



Experience with YouTube long?form.

Experience creating basic thumbnails and simple graphics.

Knowledge of paid ads metrics (CTR, CPC, CPV, etc.).



What We Offer:



Competitive salary (based on skill, not country averages).



13th?month pay, performance bonuses, and raises for results.



Stable, long?term role with a growing company.



Clear feedback, growth, and portfolio?worthy projects.



How to Apply (read carefully)

 / apply with:

Subject line: Senior Editor ‚Äì [Your Name] ‚Äì I read everything

A short intro: who you are, what you‚Äôre best at, and your expected monthly salary (USD).

Links to your 3 BEST videos (ads/shorts/VSLs). Tell us in 1 sentence what your role was in each.

Your internet speed test link and PC specs.



Applications that ignore these instructions will not be considered.

title: Looking for Acquistions Cold Caller
description:
**AVAILABILITY:**



- Part-time availability (30 hours per week).

- Must be willing to work on a Central Standard Time.

- Preferably work 6 hours a day, 5 days a week.

- Able to work from Monday to Friday.



**REQUIREMENTS:**



- Noise Cancelling Headset

- Own Headset and Computer/Laptop

- High Speed Internet must be acceptable speeds



**PREFERENCE:**



We are looking for an experienced Acquisitions Closer with at least 1-2 years of cold-calling experience, specifically in outbound sales or customer service. A background in real estate is required, and we strongly prefer candidates with experience in Surplus Funds or Unclaimed Funds.



The ideal candidate is outgoing, personable, and able to build rapport quickly. Strong communication skills and excellent customer service are essential. We are looking for someone who is ambitious, driven, and results-oriented while maintaining a humble and approachable demeanor. The ability to engage in meaningful conversations without being overly pushy is key, as is a talent for connecting with leads and managing medium to high-volume calls (30-75+ per day). KEY skills is for an individual who can read and understand obituaries and understand family trees in order to reach the point of contact.



This position involves a minimum of 20-50 conversations per day, so we are seeking someone who thrives in a fast-paced, results-driven environment. Applicants must demonstrate proven success in meeting metrics and maintaining professionalism in client interactions. A self-motivated, focused, critical thinker and goal-driven personality is essential for this role.



This is a direct hire opportunity, and we are only considering candidates with relevant experience. If you are humble, a go-getter, smart, and reliable, this is the perfect opportunity for you. Please note that this is not an entry-level position, and applicants without the necessary qualifications will not be considered.



Bonus if has an Upwork account and reviews.



Prior experience in Excess proceeds recovery is a plus, along with prior experience using Pipedrive or manual skiptracing.



**IMPORTANT INSTRUCTION:** Send your applications to 
 and when sending your applications, use "LSE-ACQ" as a subject. Failure to follow instruction will result to your application being rejected.



1. Resume

2. Disc Test - Send us an updated one using this link below: 
/free-disc-test/

3. Video Recording (Tell us a story about your proudest accomplishment in 1 minute)



**COMPENSATION:**



$5/hr 30 hours a week, plus $250 commission per closed deal

title: Industrial/Product Designer - Full Time, Remote
description:
About the Role

We‚Äôre looking for a highly creative Industrial Designer based in the Philippines to help define and evolve the visual identity of our product portfolio across high-end hair tools and power/home improvement tools.

This role focuses on product form, brand expression, CMF, and user experience. You will translate brand strategy into iconic, emotionally compelling physical products that stand out in competitive global markets.

From premium hair dryers to precision power tools, you will shape a cohesive and recognizable design language that defines who we are ‚Äî while working closely with our product development team to ensure your vision is thoughtfully executed.

?

Responsibilities

‚Ä¢ Lead the form development and aesthetic direction of new products across multiple categories.

‚Ä¢ Create a distinctive and consistent design language that strengthens brand recognition.

‚Ä¢ Explore concepts through sketching, form studies, ergonomic refinement, and 3D development.

‚Ä¢ Develop thoughtful CMF (Color, Material, Finish) strategies aligned with brand positioning.

‚Ä¢ Ensure designs consider real-world functionality, usability, and internal component integration.

‚Ä¢ Collaborate closely with the product development team to align on feasibility, performance requirements, and manufacturing considerations while maintaining design integrity.

‚Ä¢ Produce high-quality renderings and presentation visuals to communicate design intent.

‚Ä¢ Conduct trend research and competitive analysis to inform forward-thinking design decisions.

‚Ä¢ Contribute to a cohesive product ecosystem across SKUs and categories.

?

What We‚Äôre Looking For

‚Ä¢ Strong portfolio demonstrating brand-led product design, form exploration, and CMF expertise.

‚Ä¢ Experience designing consumer products (beauty, electronics, tools, home goods, lifestyle products, etc.).

‚Ä¢ Exceptional understanding of proportion, ergonomics, surface development, and user interaction.

‚Ä¢ Ability to balance aesthetics, functionality, and manufacturability.

‚Ä¢ Strong sketching skills (digital or hand).

‚Ä¢ Proficiency in 3D modeling and rendering tools such as Rhino, SolidWorks, Fusion 360, KeyShot, or similar.

‚Ä¢ Clear communication skills and experience collaborating with cross-functional teams.

?

How to Apply

Please submit your portfolio showcasing concept sketches, form development, CMF exploration, and final product renderings.

We‚Äôre looking for designers who create products people recognize instantly ‚Äî before they even see the logo.



What you'll get

Competitive Salary ‚Äì Earn in USD!

Health Coverage (HMO) ‚Äì Enjoy peace of mind after one year!

Paid Time Off ‚Äì Because work-life balance matters!

title: Sponsorships Lead for Large YouTube Channel
description:
I run a large, established YouTube channel with nearly 1 million subscribers and over 100,000 views per video.



We are looking for a serious, driven sales professional to secure sponsorship deals.



You are fully responsible for:



‚Ä¢ Creating the sponsorship strategy

‚Ä¢ Identifying target brands

‚Ä¢ Finding decision-makers

‚Ä¢ Writing and sending outreach
s

‚Ä¢ Following up consistently

‚Ä¢ Negotiating deals within approved ranges

‚Ä¢ Presenting finalized deals for approval

‚Ä¢ Managing the sponsor pipeline



You must be proactive. You will not be micromanaged.



This is not a role where you will be trained.



You are expected to create and execute your own outreach strategy. You will not be given step-by-step instructions or daily direction. You must be comfortable taking full ownership of the process and driving results independently.



You must also be comfortable communicating directly with companies. This includes professional
 communication and video calls with brand managers when necessary. You should enjoy sales conversations and feel confident representing a large brand. This is not a behind-the-scenes admin position ‚Äî you must be comfortable being visible and leading discussions.



You do not need previous YouTube sponsorship experience, but you must have:



‚Ä¢ Sales, outreach, or lead generation experience

‚Ä¢ Excellent written and verbal English

‚Ä¢ Confidence communicating with brand managers

‚Ä¢ Strong organization and follow-through

‚Ä¢ The ability to think strategically and execute without supervision



We are only interested in reputable sponsors such as VPNs, cybersecurity companies, vitamins, health products, productivity tools, and similar legitimate brands. No gambling, crypto schemes, or low-quality products.



Compensation:



This is a non-salaried, commission-only role. You will receive 20% of all sponsorship deals you close.



For a channel of this size, that is a significant earning opportunity. Individual deals are worth thousands of dollars.



There is no cap on earnings. Your income is directly tied to your ability to secure and close quality sponsorships.



Include the word ORANGE in the subject line of your application.



Please tell me about yourself, your sales experience, and outline how you would approach landing the first sponsorship.

title: Transaction Coordinator
description:
We are seeking a detail-oriented, high-energy Transaction Coordinator to manage our real estate files from contract to close. You will be the "air traffic controller" for our deals, ensuring every disclosure is signed, every county inspection is ordered, and every escrow stays exactly on schedule.

The ideal candidate has a deep understanding of the MLS, is a DocuSign power user, and takes pride in a perfectly organized file. And most importantly follow directions.



Key Responsibilities

Contract & Disclosure Management

Document Preparation: Draft and prepare Purchase Agreements and Listing Agreements with 100?curacy.

Disclosure Oversight: Assemble and distribute state and locally mandated Disclosure Packages.

DocuSign Administration: Manage the end-to-end digital signature process, ensuring all parties sign in the correct order and all initials are captured.

Broker Compliance: Audit all files to ensure they are "broker-ready" and fully compliant with state regulations before the closing date.

Escrow & Timeline Coordination

Timeline Management: Maintain the master escrow calendar and aggressively track critical deadlines (EMD, Inspection Periods, Contingency Removals).

Closing Preparation: Research and pull all county-specific inspections, point-of-sale requirements, and municipal certifications required prior to the Close of Escrow (COE).

Communication: Act as the main point of contact for escrow officers, lenders, and cooperating agents to keep the transaction moving forward.

Research & Analysis

Market Analysis: Run accurate property comparables (comps) using the MLS to support valuation and offer strategies.

Property Research: Pull county-specific probate information and verify property ownership/liens through public records.



Technical Requirements

title: Social Media Growth ‚Äî X (Twitter) & LinkedIn
description:
About Me:

I'm a content manager at a leading AI company and run a YouTube affiliate marketing education business on the side. I'm looking for a social media manager to grow my personal presence on X and LinkedIn ‚Äî turning my expertise in AI, content strategy, and affiliate marketing into a consistent, engaging presence on both platforms.



What You'll Do:

- Write and schedule 5-7 posts per week across X and LinkedIn (mix of threads, short-form takes, carousels, and text posts) using Buffer

- Repurpose my existing content (YouTube videos, course material, insights) into platform-native posts ‚Äî I'll send you ideas, direction, and photos to work from

- Research trending topics in AI, creator economy, and affiliate marketing to inform content angles

- Engage with relevant accounts ‚Äî reply, quote-tweet, and comment to grow visibility

- Track growth metrics weekly (followers, impressions, engagement rate) and report what's working

- Study top-performing creators in similar niches and adapt proven formats

- All posts will be reviewed by me before going live



You're a Great Fit If You:

- Have flawless written English and strong copywriting skills ‚Äî this is non-negotiable

- Have experience growing X and/or LinkedIn accounts (share examples or case studies)

- Write in a direct, conversational tone ‚Äî not corporate or generic

- Take ownership and show initiative ‚Äî I want someone who brings ideas and drives the content calendar, not someone who waits to be told what to post

- Understand the AI and creator economy space (or are eager to learn fast)

- Are comfortable with ghostwriting ‚Äî posts go out under my name and voice

- Are proficient with Buffer for scheduling and content management

- Available for weekly async check-ins



To Apply:

1. Share a link to accounts you've managed or grown, or examples of past social media work

2. Record a webcam video (1-5 minutes) introducing yourself, explaining why you're a good fit, and how you'd approach growing the accounts in the first 30 days



Compensation: Open to discuss based on experience. Looking for a long-term collaborator, not a one-off hire.

-Strong skills in video editing software (such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro) to create compelling motion graphics and video content.

-Familiarity with Figma and other design collaboration tools is a plus.

title: Senior Accountant
description:
Senior Accountant



Location: Philippines (Fully Remote)

Schedule: US Mountain Time (Approx. 12:00 PM ‚Äì 8:00 AM PH Time)

Salary: 100,000‚Äì120,000 PH pesos per month (based on experience)

Employment Type: Full-Time



The Role



We're seeking a Senior Accountant to own accounting operations for multiple brands including our furniture brands, online design services, and parent company operating expenses. You'll manage the full accounting cycle, month-end close, and financial reporting across multiple entities.

This is a full-time employee position (not contract work) working remotely from the Philippines on US Mountain Time hours (9am-5pm MT / 12am-8am Philippine Time). This is a high-ownership individual contributor role.



What You'll Own



Month-End Close & Financial Reporting

Execute full monthly close for multiple brands across furniture and services

Prepare journal entries, accruals, and balance sheet reconciliations

Generate monthly financial statements and variance analysis

Partner with US-based Accounting Manager on reporting and special projects



Revenue & Operations Accounting

Revenue recognition under ASC 606 for both product sales and design services

Gross profit analysis and margin tracking

Manage accounts payable workflow and vendor payments

Support accounts receivable and customer billing

Reconcile payment processors and banking accounts



Compliance & Process

Ensure GAAP compliance across all processes

Assist with annual audit preparation and execution

Support sales tax, franchise tax, and other compliance requirements

Identify and implement process improvements



What You Bring



Required:

Bachelor's degree in Accounting

5+ years progressive accounting experience

Prior US accounting experience strongly preferred

Advanced Excel skills (pivot tables, vlookups, complex formulas)

Fluent English (written and verbal) - you'll communicate daily with US team

Strong understanding of US GAAP and financial reporting

Exceptional attention to detail and problem-solving skills

Self-directed with strong ownership mentality

Own laptop/computer capable of running accounting software

Stable high-speed internet connection for remote work



Preferred:

CPA or equivalent license

NetSuite and/or QuickBooks Online experience (we use both)

E-commerce or retail industry experience

Public accounting background (Big 4 or regional firm)

Tipalti experience (AP automation platform)

Shopify, Stripe, or Ramp experience



Work Environment

Fully remote from the Philippines

Dedicated quiet workspace required

Availability during US Mountain Time business hours (12am-8am Philippine Time)



Compensation & Benefits

Employee status with full Philippine labor law compliance

Competitive salary 100,
,000 PH pesos/month

13th month pay 

Government benefits (SSS, PhilHealth, Pag-IBIG)

Work with a growing accounting team (both Philippines and US-based)

description:

The Role

We're seeking a Senior Cost Accountant to own cost accounting and inventory operations for our curated global artisan brands. This role is heavily focused on inventory accounting, standard costing, landed costs, and cost of goods sold analysis.

This is a full-time employee position (not contract work) working remotely from the Philippines on US Mountain Time hours (9am-5pm MT / 12am-8am Philippine Time). This is a high-ownership individual contributor role.



What You'll Own

Manage perpetual inventory accounting for 2+ brands across multiple SKUs

Average costing: Ensure system accuracy for costing

Landed cost accounting: Track and allocate freight, duties, customs costs

Inventory reconciliations and variance analysis (monthly physical counts from 3PL)

Cost of goods sold (COGS) analysis and margin reporting

Work closely with operations on inventory movements and adjustments



Month-End Close & Financial Reporting

Execute full monthly close for 2+ brands

Prepare journal entries, accruals, and balance sheet reconciliations

Generate monthly financial statements and gross profit analysis

Partner with US-based Accounting Manager on reporting and special projects



Compliance & Process

Ensure GAAP compliance for inventory accounting

Assist with annual audit (especially inventory sections)

Support sales tax and other compliance requirements

Identify and implement inventory process improvements



What You Bring

Required:

Bachelor's degree in Accounting

5+ years progressive accounting experience

Strong cost accounting / inventory accounting background

Prior US accounting experience strongly preferred

Most projects take between 5‚Äì40 hours to complete, and I need someone who can consistently deliver finished designs within 4 days or less. ‚Ä¢ Documentation is clear and organized

‚Ä¢ Escalations are timely and professional



Who We‚Äôre Looking For

‚Ä¢ Have experience in US. logistics, freight, tracking, quality assurance, or operational audit

Work Setup & Schedule

title: Telehealth Customer Representative
description:
Hi!

We are looking for Admin Assistant/Patient Coordinator that will assist in providing administrative support to the growing telehealth team. 

Administration Assistant/Patient Coordinator will oversee and manage the day-to-day operations of the telehealth department in collaboration with the team, ensuring efficient patient onboarding, scheduling, monitoring turnaround times, and working directly with the team to support patient needs.

Assist in formalizing department policies, protocols, and educational materials. In addition to acting as the point of contact for the telehealth team, the Admin Assistant/Patient Coordinator will also act as a liaison between internal teams, working cross-functionally to further optimize operations and maintain high service quality.



RESPONSIBILITIES

* Collaborate with the team on recurring medical tea
eting agenda, discussion, and recap
s

* Coordinate patient coverage/assistance, following up with patient onboarding, cancellations, encounters, turnaround times, and orders are being done in a timely manner.

* Assistant in any patient company questions as a staff member

* Report platform issues in a timely manner and field requests from the telehealth team for future enhancements to the EMR; support scoping and/or QAing of these new features, as needed

* Manage calendars, schedule clinical meetings and training meetings at the request of leadership in support of clinical medical operations

* Develop and document prescription protocols, quality assurance plans, and work standards

* Assist with various administrative components of the EMR, as needed (e.g., setting up new providers)

* Develop onboarding and education materials for current and new medical providers under the guidance of leadership

* Assist with all EMR Medical Team related questions and facilitate communication with internal and external stakeholders



QUALIFICATIONS

* Medical and/or telehealth experience a plus; RN experience a plus

* Interest in longevity/weight loss is a plus

* Highly organized and systematic with attention to detail and the ability to prioritize and complete tasks with a high degree of accuracy

REQUIREMENTS:

Must have a laptop

Dual Monitors

Knowledge of word and excel

Quite workspace

Excellent customer service mindset





***Self-Recorded Video Interview Questions -MUST NEED in order to proceed to the interview phase. We are hiring this week! Please do not send a generic prerecorded video as it would not be considered. Please answer all 4 interview questions in the video.



1. Personal Motivation & Fit

Tell us about yourself and what excites you most about working in the healthcare/wellness space. How do you see your role contributing to a positive patient experience?



2. Service & Sales Success Story

Share a past experience where you helped a patient or customer through a challenging situation, what was the scenario, how did you handle it, and what was the outcome?



3. Handling Patient Hesitation

Imagine a potential patient is unsure about starting a wellness or weight loss program. How would you address their concerns while making them feel comfortable and supported?



4. Explaining Wellness Services

If a patient asked you to explain our weight loss and wellness solutions in simple, easy-to-understand terms, how would you describe them?



5. Value & Contribution

Why do you believe you‚Äôd be a strong fit for our team, and what unique skills or experiences will you bring that will help patients feel cared for and motivated?

title: Carrier Sales Representative
description:
GH Logistics is a growing freight brokerage and asset-based logistics company specializing in dry van and reefer freight. Our strength comes from reliable carrier partnerships, disciplined execution, and scalable capacity across the U.S.



As our network continues to expand, we‚Äôre looking for a Carrier Sales Representative to help us build strong, long-term relationships with carriers and support clean, on-time freight execution. If you enjoy structured outbound work, building partnerships, and working in a fast-paced logistics environment this role offers clear expectations, measurable growth, and career advancement.



Role Overview

This role combines carrier network expansion and load coverage execution.



Carrier Development (Network Growth)

You will be responsible for: 

‚Ä¢ Reach out to 20-50 carriers daily to introduce GH Logistics

‚Ä¢ Verify carriers for insurance, authority, safety, and compliance 

‚Ä¢ Complete carrier onboarding and setup documentation

‚Ä¢ Educate carriers on our lanes and freight opportunities

‚Ä¢ Position carriers for repeat, long-term business, not one time loads

‚Ä¢ Create at least 1 group chat per onboarded carrier daily

‚Ä¢ Send mass
s to carrier lists to support load coverage

‚Ä¢ Maintain organized activity tracking and communication logs



Carrier Sales (Coverage & Execution)

‚Ä¢ Cover shipments using GH approved carriers

‚Ä¢ Source capacity through calls, load boards, and existing contacts

‚Ä¢ Book at least 1 load through approved carriers

‚Ä¢ Secure at least 1 dedicated lane per week through repeat carrier usage

‚Ä¢ Manage carrier communication through structured group chats

‚Ä¢ Follow up to create recurring lane opportunities

‚Ä¢ Coordinate with internal teams to ensure smooth execution

‚Ä¢ Update and maintain tracking spreadsheets daily with accurate activity data



What Success Looks Like

‚Ä¢ Consistent 20-50 calls daily

‚Ä¢ At least 5 quality carriers onboarded and activated regularly

‚Ä¢ Carriers are fully set up, connected, and positioned for repeat freight

‚Ä¢ Loads covered on time with clean communication

‚Ä¢ Communication is centralized, documented, and reliable

‚Ä¢ Carriers move from onboarding to activation to recurring usage



Who We‚Äôre Looking For

‚Ä¢ Have experience in Carrier Sales, Dispatch, Freight Brokerage, or Trucking Operations

‚Ä¢ Comfortable making 20 - 50 outbound calls per day

‚Ä¢ Highly organized, tech savvy, and able to manage multiple spreadsheets and group chats

‚Ä¢ Type at least 50 WPM

‚Ä¢ Thrives in a fast paced and high urgency freight environment

‚Ä¢ Communicate professionally via phone, chat, and

‚Ä¢ Performance driven and KPI oriented

‚Ä¢ Capable of leading structured carrier conversations and daily meetings

‚Ä¢ Follows instructions consistently and executes with precision

‚Ä¢ Team oriented, coachable, and open to feedback without ego



Schedule & Work Setup

‚Ä¢ Full Time | Monday Friday

‚Ä¢ 7:00 AM ‚Äì 5:00 PM CST (San Antonio time)

‚Ä¢ Must work U.S. business hours

‚Ä¢ Collaborative Zoom based work environment (with camera open and unmuted audio) 

‚Ä¢ Time tracking software used for accountability and performance support



Compensation & Growth

‚Ä¢ Starting Base:  $8/hour (Up to $10/hour inclusive of performance incentives)

‚Ä¢ Performance Incentives: Based on carrier onboarding, activation, and load execution

‚Ä¢ Career Path: Carrier Development to Senior Carrier Rep to Account Manager. We promote based on performance and consistency.



Why Join GH Logistics?

‚Ä¢ Structured systems and clear expectations

‚Ä¢ Hands on leadership and direct feedback

‚Ä¢ Defined KPIs and measurable growth

‚Ä¢ Opportunity to grow within a scaling freight brokerage

‚Ä¢ Performance based advancement



If you‚Äôre looking for a role where effort is recognized and growth is tied to output, we‚Äôd love to hear from you.



Apply Now:

title: Video Editor - Meta Ads
description:
We partner with medical practices and doctors to build dominant digital presences through strategic content and paid advertising. We capture high-quality video content in quarterly shoots and transform that raw footage into organic posts and high-converting video ads that position our clients as the leading authorities in their medical markets. We‚Äôre now expanding our team to meet growing demand. I‚Äôm looking for an absolute expert in video editing.



Role & Responsibilities

As our Video Editor, your main responsibilities will include:

- Reviewing and organizing hours of footage

- Adding B-roll, subtitles, and appropriate music to talking head videos

- Editing multiple short-form reels for Meta ads and organic content

- Creating eye-catching, scroll-stopping content

- Managing multiple projects while meeting deadlines

- Proficiency in CapCut Pro and Adobe Suite (Premiere Pro, After Effects, Photoshop, Illustrator)

- Working with a reliable internet connection and a computer capable of handling video editing software

- Comfortable communicating and collaborating through Asana and Slack





What We‚Äôre Looking For

You should have:

- Advanced English language skills

- An upbeat, helpful attitude

- 100% honesty and transparency

- Attention to detail (e.g., include your coffee order in the subject line!)

- Advanced knowledge of hooks and viral video techniques

- Advanced understanding of Meta ads

- Optional but valuable: Graphic design skills (thumbnails, social media graphics, motion graphics)

- If you cannot commit to daily output of 5‚Äì10 videos, please do not apply.



What We Value Most

- Good taste in design and content

- Timeliness and reliability

- Honesty and integrity

- Continuous desire to improve

- Asking questions and seeking clarification when needed

- Ability to follow step-by-step instructions

 A self-starter mindset and fearlessness in learning and helping



Work Schedule

- 5 videos edited per day

- Flexible hours; we care about quality and turnaround



Why Join Us?

You‚Äôll be on the ground floor of helping our clients grow amazing businesses. Having had challenging bosses in the past, I‚Äôve dedicated my career to creating a respectful, supportive, and growth-focused environment. You‚Äôll be highly valued, and together, we‚Äôll push each other to improve. We‚Äôre excited to work with someone who is as passionate about video editing and digital marketing as we are!



How to Apply

Please send the following when applying:

1. Your portfolio showcasing your video editing work, including reels, ads, and social media videos

2. Your resume, with references if possible

3. The completed Test Assignment (provided separately)

title: Sales Associate
description:
Job Title: Remote Sales Associate (Virtual Assistant - Sales Support)

Company: Caststone Solutions Company

Location: Remote (Applicants must be based in the Philippines)

Work Schedule: Primarily aligned with US Central Standard Time (CST) hours to support calling and coordination during business hours in Texas. We can discuss flexible arrangements, such as dedicated calling days, to support better work-life balance.

Compensation: Competitive hourly rate (to be discussed based on experience and skills; paid via [preferred method, e.g., PayPal/Wise/direct transfer]).

About Caststone Solutions Company

We are a commercial concrete company based in the Dallas-Fort Worth (DFW) area of Texas, USA. We specialize in providing high-quality cast stone and concrete solutions for commercial projects, including architectural features for buildings, schools, and professional entities. Our goal is to secure more commercial contracts by building relationships and responding to opportunities in the construction and public sector.

Job Overview

We are seeking a motivated and reliable Remote Sales Associate to support our owner in growing the business. This role is a balanced mix of outbound sales outreach (making calls to set meetings) and organized office/admin work (researching and submitting bids). You will receive full training on our industry, products, processes, and tools‚Äîno prior experience in commercial concrete or construction is required.

The ideal candidate is fluent in English with excellent spoken and written communication, highly organized, detail-oriented, and has a positive, proactive attitude. This is a great opportunity for someone eager to learn sales support in a US-based business while working remotely from the Philippines.

Key Responsibilities



Outbound Calling & Lead Generation (approx. 50% of time):

Make professional outbound calls to governmental entities (e.g., school districts), architects, contractors, property managers, and other potential clients in the DFW area and beyond.

Introduce our company, qualify leads, and schedule meetings or follow-ups for the owner.

Build rapport through clear, confident, and wise communication.



Bid Research & Submission (approx. 50% of time):

Search online for public and private construction bids/projects (using websites, portals, and databases).

Gather relevant project details and prepare/submit bids or proposals on behalf of the company.

Maintain accurate records of leads, calls, bids, and follow-ups.



Administrative & Organizational Support:

Use tools like Excel (or Google Sheets) to track leads, call logs, bid statuses, and pipelines‚Äîkeeping everything organized for easy review by the owner.

Handle basic data entry,
 follow-ups, and scheduling.

Assist with other sales support tasks as needed.





Required Qualifications & Skills



Fluent in English with strong verbal communication skills (clear speaking, good pronunciation, confidence on calls).

Excellent written English for
s and bid documents.

Strong organizational skills and attention to detail‚Äîable to manage multiple tasks, track progress, and keep records tidy.

Comfortable learning and using basic tools like Excel/Google Sheets,
, calendars, and web browsers.

Reliable high-speed internet, quiet workspace, and a good headset for clear calls.

Positive attitude, eagerness to learn, and willingness to take initiative.

Available to work during US Central Standard Time business hours (e.g., mornings/afternoons PH time).



Preferred (but not required)



Previous experience in customer service, sales, cold calling, appointment setting, admin work, or virtual assistance.

Familiarity with CRM tools, Google Workspace, or bid platforms (training provided if not).

Basic understanding of construction or sales processes (not necessary‚Äîwe'll train you).



What We Offer



Full training and ongoing support from the owner.

Opportunity to grow with the company and contribute to real business success.

Flexible elements in scheduling where possible.

Long-term role for the right fit.



If you're organized, a great communicator, and excited to support a growing US company from the Philippines, we'd love to hear from you!

Please apply by sending your resume, a brief introduction about yourself, and why you're interested in this role. Include a short voice note or record a quick video (1-2 minutes) introducing yourself and demonstrating your English speaking skills‚Äîthis will help us assess communication fit.

We look forward to potentially working with you!

Ideal Candidate

How to Apply (Read Carefully)

?

 and SMS
